[add product]
URL: <base url>/service/product_add.php

HTTP POST this json:
{
	"title":"Test",
	"tags":["test_tag","test tag2"],
	"shortDescription":"short test",
	"longDescription":"long test",
	"ean13":"978-3-86680-192-9",
	"isOnline":"false",
	"status":"Used",
	"price":1.0,
	"vatRate":10.0,
	"amount":1,
	"categoryId":2,
	"supplierId":0,
	"stockLocationId": 20, 
	"images":[""]
}

hint: Images have to be base64 encoded.
